resources.string: AnyRen is a smart client of \"renren\".

AnyApp series applications for those original applications who have poor experience provide a better service for user. The user can experience the web service provided by the content providers directly through Anyapp series applications. It is not only convenient for the user, as well as add a distribution channel for content providers. 

AnyApp is free for user; 

AnyApp divide into two parts，one is "the AnyApp software itself" and the other is "the displaying content" 
 "the AnyApp software itself" is protected by the GPLv3 license. Anyone can make the Anyapp perfect，but the original author retain all legal rights.（if you have any problem about those，please contact with the author.） 
 "the displaying content" provide public domain name for content providers，"the AnyApp software itself" does not make any changes to its contents，so there is no infringement, we also do not guarantee any thing from its content; 

Acknowledgements： 
 Special thanks to the support of Dear 曹梦寒! 
 Thanks for Renren Inc.
